concept.title: Quiz: Content Reuse
concept.shortdesc: This quiz assesses your understanding of content reuse concepts in DITA.

conbody.p: 1. What is a major benefit of content reuse in DITA?

ul.li: b) Reduces the need for XML editors

conbody.p: 2. Which DITA attribute would be most appropriate for filtering content between "Basic" and "Professional" software editions?
3. Which DITA feature allows reuse of specific elements like steps or notes with automatic synchronization?
4. When should you use the copy-to attribute instead of conref?

ul.li: a) When you want automatic content synchronization

li.b: b) When you need the same content to appear with different navigation contexts or URLs

ul.li: c) When you want to translate content into multiple languages
d) When you need to filter content for different audiences

conbody.p: 5. How does reuse benefit translation workflows?

ul.li: a) Requires translating all content separately

li.b: b) Reused elements only need to be translated once

ul.li: d) Combines multiple languages into one topic
